nodes.text: The Balis-Baurgh system was a star system located within the Mid Rim region of the galaxy which contained three planets, shielded from sensors by natural gas clouds solar radiation. One of the three planets, Balis-Baurgh, was capable of sustaining life; the leaders of that world built a space station which was subsequently sabotaged by the Empire. The leaders blamed each other and started a civil war, that ended in Imperial occupation. The station in orbit became a prison for Junas Turner and Grael, who later escaped.
